definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Towards the end, it's Grenade spamming gone overboard.
sentences.chinese: 臨近結束時，它的榴彈的垃圾郵件了過分。

sentences.english: Were they junk mail or evidence her husband was having an affair?
sentences.chinese: 這些只是垃圾郵件呢，還是她丈夫有外遇的證據？

sentences.english: And, come to think of it, why not include the junk e-mails?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我想起來了，爲什麼不把垃圾郵件算進去呢？

sentences.english: Don't send chain letters virus warnings or junk mail.
sentences.chinese: 不要發送連鎖信，病毒警告信或垃圾郵件。

sentences.english: People despised it so much it nearly killed e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 人們如此討厭垃圾郵件，差點就扼殺了電子郵箱。

sentences.english: Of rubbish mail put in, also be the contribution of baleful software.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾郵件的投放，也是惡意軟件的功勞。

sentences.english: Plenty of money has been thrown at start-ups offering anti-spam software.
sentences.chinese: 大量資金被投入到防垃圾郵件軟件的開發。

sentences.english: Delete chaine-mails and junk email. Do not forward or reply to any of them.
sentences.chinese: 把連鎖信和垃圾郵件統統刪除，不要轉發或者回復。

sentences.english: An error occurred while trying to empty the Junk E-mail folder.
sentences.chinese: 試圖清空垃圾郵件文件夾時發生錯誤。

sentences.english: But spammers are a creative bunch.
sentences.chinese: 然而，垃圾郵件製作者是很有創造力的一羣人。

sentences.english: Links are not to be spammy, no link farms.
sentences.chinese: 鏈接是不被垃圾郵件的，沒有鏈接農場。

sentences.english: The purpose of such attacks is generally identify theft and to spread spam.
sentences.chinese: 這種攻擊通常是爲了盜竊身份並傳發垃圾郵件。

sentences.english: NEW YORK - E-mail is crippled, concussed by an irrepressible spam stream.
sentences.chinese: 電子郵件是殘廢的，因爲有持續不斷的垃圾郵件衝擊。

sentences.english: Spammers also need lots of addresses to evade the filters.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾郵件製作者們同樣需要很多地址來躲避過濾器。

sentences.english: Because they are backward-looking, they only deal with spam that has already been sent.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他們是向後看，他們只處理垃圾郵件已經發出。

definition: lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
